content: Definition of Switch: A switch is when the drugs in Current_Regimen are replaced by entirely different drugs in Next_Regimen and are not present in it.
Definition of Add-On: A drug is considered an add-on when it appears in the Next_Regimen but was not in the Current_Regimen, and the Current_Regimen drugs are still present.
Column patient_id (TEXT): Unique identifier for a patient.
Column Current_Regimen: Refers to the list or combination of drugs the patient is currently receiving.
Each row in patient_regimen_data represents a unique regimen for a patient, including Current_Regimen, Previous_Regimen, and Next_Regimen drug lists.
Only SELECT queries are allowed. Do not write INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, or DROP.
